點.definition: point; dot; drop; speck; o'clock; point (in space or time); to draw a dot; to check on a list; to choose; to order (food in a restaurant); to touch briefly; to hint; to light; to ignite; to pour a liquid drop by drop; (old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]; dot stroke in Chinese characters; classifier for items

點亮.definition: to illuminate; to turn on the lights; to light (a blaze)

點兵.definition: to muster troops; (fig.) to gather forces

點到即止.definition: to touch on sth and leave it there; to take care not to overdo sth

點化.definition: magic transformation performed by Daoist immortal; fig. to reveal; to enlighten

點名.definition: roll call; to mention sb by name; (to call or praise or criticize sb) by name

點名冊.definition: register of names; attendance roll book

點名羞辱.definition: to attack publicly; to stage a denunciation campaign

點單.definition: to place an order; to order

點大.definition: (of a child etc) small as a mite; minuscule

點子.definition: spot; point; dot; speck; drop (of liquid); droplet; point (of argument); idea; crux; indication; pointer

點子背.definition: (coll.) to have a stroke of bad luck

點射.definition: to fire in bursts; shooting intermittently

點將.definition: to appoint a general (in theater); fig. to appoint sb for a task

點心.definition: light refreshments; pastry; dim sum (in Cantonese cooking); dessert

點撥.definition: to give instructions; to give advice

點播.definition: webcast; to request item for broadcast on radio program; dibble seeding; spot seeding

點擊.definition: to hit; to press; to strike (on the keyboard); to click (a web page button)

點擊付費廣告.pinyin: diǎn jī fù fèi guǎng gào

點擊數.definition: number of clicks; number of hits (on a website)

點收.definition: to check sth and accept it

點數.definition: to count and check; to tally; points (collected in some bonus scheme etc)

點斑林鴿.definition: (bird species of China) speckled wood pigeon (Columba hodgsonii)

點斷式.definition: designed to be torn off along a line of perforations

點染.definition: to touch up (a piece of writing); to add details (to a painting)

點檢.definition: to inspect one by one; to list individually

點歌.definition: to request a song to be played; to pick a karaoke song

點水.definition: to skim; lightly touching the water (as the dragonfly in the idiom 蜻蜓點水|蜻蜓点水); skin-deep

點水不漏.definition: not one drop of water leaks (idiom); fig. thoughtful and completely rigorous; watertight

點津.definition: to solve a problem; to answer a question; (Internet) Q&A forum; advice column

點滴.definition: a drip; a little bit; intravenous drip (used to administer drugs)

點火.definition: to ignite; to light a fire; to agitate; to start an engine; ignition; fig. to stir up trouble

點煙器.definition: cigarette lighter (in a car); 12-volt cigarette lighter receptacle

點燃.definition: to ignite; to set on fire; aflame

點發.definition: to fire in bursts; shooting intermittently

點睛.definition: to add the finishing touch (abbr. for 畫龍點睛|画龙点睛[hua4 long2 dian3 jing1])

點睛之筆.definition: the brush stroke that dots in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch; the crucial point that brings the subject to life; a few words to clinch the point

點石成金.definition: to touch base matter and turn it to gold (idiom); fig. to turn crude writing into a literary gem

點破.definition: to lay bare in a few words; to expose with a word; to point out bluntly

點穴.definition: to hit a pressure point (martial arts); dim mak; see also 點脈|点脉[dian3 mai4]

點穿.definition: to lay bare in a few words; to expose with a word

點竄.definition: to reword; to edit a text

點綴.definition: to decorate; to adorn; sprinkled; studded; only for show

點胸鴉雀.definition: (bird species of China) spot-breasted parrotbill (Paradoxornis guttaticollis)

點脈.definition: to hit a pressure point (martial arts); dim mak; see also 點穴|点穴[dian3 xue2]

點補.definition: to have a snack; to have a bite

點視.definition: to check (items); to count and verify

點視廳.definition: hall where convicts are counted and verified

點評.definition: to comment; a point by point commentary

點贊.definition: to like; to upvote (on social media)

點軍.definition: Dianjun district of Yichang city 宜昌市[Yi2 chang1 shi4], Hubei

點軍區.definition: Dianjun district of Yichang city 宜昌市[Yi2 chang1 shi4], Hubei

點選.definition: to select; (computing) to click on (one of several options); to navigate to (a webpage)

點醒.definition: to point out; to draw sb's attention to sth; to cause sb to have a realization

點金成鐵.definition: to transform gold into base metal (idiom); fig. to edit sb else's beautiful prose and ruin it

點鐵成金.definition: to touch base matter and turn it to gold (idiom); fig. to turn crude writing into a literary gem

點閱率.definition: click-through rate (for websites or online advertisements)

點陣式打印機.pinyin: diǎn zhèn shì dǎ yìn jī

點頭咂嘴.definition: to approve by nodding one's head and smacking one's lips (idiom)

點頭哈腰.definition: to nod one's head and bow (idiom); bowing and scraping; unctuous fawning

點題.definition: to bring out the main theme; to make the point; to bring out the substance concisely

點餐.definition: (at a restaurant) to order a meal; (of a waiter) to take an order

點鬼火.definition: to stir up trouble in secret; to instigate

點點滴滴.definition: bit by bit; dribs and drabs; the little details; every aspect
